title: Ensemble Learning Optimization: Designing Efficient Classification Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Machine learning basics, classification algorithm comprehension, and Python programming experience
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based learning tools, with team-based case analysis and model implementation projects

learning_goals: They can explain and apply selective indicator design methods based on the knowledge particle principle.
They can efficiently organize classifier spaces by class using adaptive strategies.
They can implement ensemble systems with stable generalization performance under limited computing resources.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
